attributes.action: Mr Cameron to discuss gun control with President Obama and have a friendly word about Piers.
attributes.additional_details: Prime Minister Cameron to address President Obama about his roadmap to gun control.  PM DC should be concerned about the safety of British Citizens abroad in USA and their continued safety.  He should also remind President Obama that Piers Morgan is exercising his right to the freedom of speech and ask that the frivolous epetition asking for his deportation be dropped immediately.   Signed the people with sense
